title: Could you strip back your wardrobe to only 27 pieces?
text:
Is 27 the magic number when it comes to formulating a 'perfect' wardrobe? Charlotte Warburton, the founder of new personal styling agency To Be Created, thinks so and is trying to convince clients to shop with sustainability in mind via a new minimalist approach.

"A lot of women buy really amazing clothes for events, but they struggle with what to wear day to day," she tells The Telegraph. "I have found they come to me to create that basics wardrobe.”

Warburton advises women to shop in a more logical way and strip back their every day wardrobe to 27 essential items which should all go together, helping to avoid the classic dilemma of not knowing what to wear with what in the morning.
